General.Name: Sailun Jinyu Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Sailun Group Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, sells, and services tires in China. It provides TBR, PCR, and OTR tires. The company was formerly known as Sailun Jinyu Group Co., Ltd. Sailun Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Qingdao, China.

4.Name: Mr. Jun  Song
4.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors and Director
